attributes.action: Save Uber Mini Cab service. Renew the licence and keep Uber active in London.
attributes.additional_details: If you've ever used Uber, you will know that there is NO alternative service that offers the same quality and serivce. Please hekp by signing this petition. TOGETHER WE WILL STAND!!!
attributes.background: Uber mini-cab sservice has been one of the greatest innovations in Londn for over 200 years. Please sign and help save this service that we all rely upon on a daily basis. Uber gives us ALL a choice and unbeatable service and prices to get where we need to be.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
